Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2008 05:23PM smjtwinsmomma wrote: I am having lat surgery as well on 4/14/08.  I am scared to death!! PLEASE let me know how your surgery goes!! I feel better after reading some of the comments on here (I am new to this site).  Mine is a recurrence at prior mastectomy site.  My original surgery was in 1999 and I had radiation.  I am really worried about healing and movement afterwards.  Thanks, Susan
Posts.Title: Anyone having surgery in April?? ottawagirl wahine
